app.title: TravelAI - Your Intelligent Travel Assistant
app.description: Plan perfect trips with AI assistance. Get personalized itineraries, budget planning, and travel recommendations.

chat.welcomeTitle: Plan Your Perfect Trip with AI
chat.welcomeDescription: Get personalized travel itineraries, recommendations, and expert advice
chat.inputPlaceholder: Ask me anything about your travel plans...
chat.disclaimer: TravelAI may produce inaccurate information. Verify details before booking.

paris.title: Weekend in Paris
paris.description: Plan a 3-day trip to Paris on a budget
paris.prompt: I'd like to plan a 3-day weekend trip to Paris. I'm interested in culture, museums, and good food. My budget is around $1500 excluding flights.

family.title: Family Beach Vacation
family.description: Plan a 7-day beach trip for a family of 4
family.prompt: I want to plan a 7-day family beach vacation for 4 people (2 adults, 2 kids aged 8 and 12). We're looking for family-friendly activities and accommodations.

adventure.title: Adventure in New Zealand
adventure.description: Plan a 10-day adventure trip with hiking
adventure.prompt: I'm planning a 10-day adventure trip to New Zealand. I love hiking, outdoor activities, and scenic views. Budget is around $3000.

food.title: Food Tour in Italy
food.description: Plan a culinary journey through Italy
food.prompt: I want to plan a culinary journey through Italy for 2 weeks. I'm passionate about authentic local cuisine and cooking classes.
